properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
MOROCCO.
DNC 08.
S/V THIASSI DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE
FAILURE IN VICINITY 32-00.40N 011-27.20W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC RABAT,
PHONE: 2125 3762 5877,
FAX: 2125 3762 5017,
E-MAIL: MRCCRABAT@GMAIL.COM.
